text: Ricky Bibey (22 September 1981 - 17 July 2022) was an English professional rugby league footballer. Bibey was born in Leigh, England. Bibey played in the 2000s and 2010s. He played at representative level for England (A-Team), and at club level for Wigan Warriors (Heritage No. 941), Leigh Centurions (Heritage No. 1211) (three spells), St. Helens (Heritage No. 1137), Oldham (Heritage No.) and Wakefield Trinity Wildcats (Heritage No. 1253). He was forced to retire in May 2012. Bibey was found dead, aged 40, at his hotel room in Florence, Italy on 17 July 2022.Former Wakefield Trinity and Wigan Warriors player Ricky Bibey passes away at the age of 40 ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at leighcenturions.com * Statistics at wigan.rlfans.com *Profile at saints.org.uk Category:1981 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Greater Manchester
